titleStmt.title: Concerning sons and daughters, and prophetesses speaking and prophecying, in the law and the gospel and concerning womens learning in silence and also concerning womens not speaking in the church ...
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; date suggested by Wing.
Item at 1460:51 imperfect: pages cropped and stained, with loss of print.
Reproductions of originals in the Bevan-Naish Collection (1460:51) and Swarthmore College Library (2910:3).
